Welcome To Maa Ganga Vidyalaya

Instilling important life skills through discipline and punctuality is something we value

Read More

WELCOME TO MAA GANGA VIDYALAYA

"Where Minds Soar, Excellence Prevails!"

About us

Maa Ganga Vidyalaya, Rajokri, New Delhi, is a senior secondary school recognised and affiliated to CBSE (Central Board of Secondary Education).We believe in developing young minds to flourish and thrive. Our school is a lively and energetic learning community, dedicated to allowing with knowledge and values that will guide them towards a bright future.

Maa Ganga Vidyalaya was established in 2003, with an aim to provide quality education for the students. Our school is a place where creativity is celebrated, curiosity is ignited, and hard work is always encouraged.

We have  experienced and passionate teachers, who are committed to inspire students. Through innovative teaching methods and modern resources, we aim to equip our students with essential skills and a strong moral compass.

choosing-us

why choose us

Nurturing Environment

Maa Ganga Vidyalaya offers a nurturing and vibrant learning space, where students thrive academically and personally.

Holistic Development

With experienced teachers and a focus on holistic development, students are empowered with knowledge, values, creativity, and sportsmanship.

Character Building

Instilling discipline, punctuality, and life skills, we prepare students for real-world challenges, fostering academic excellence and personal growth.

Activities

Discover boundless opportunities through vibrant activities at Maa Ganga Vidyalaya, igniting passions, nurturing talents, and fostering all-around growth.

A Speech of the Principles that Drives Progress

driving positive change

Maa Ganga Vidyalaya, in the past years has grown from strength to strength in terms of upholding the MGV tradition of academic excellence, commitment to imparting the best that education has to offer and honing in on and fine tuning every child’s individual talent. 

The formative years of a child are of utmost importance and when nurtured, and sure to yield the fruits of success. We continue to reach for the stars and work towards our goal of seeing all our students grow up to be well integrated, socially responsible, and morally upright individuals.

 All big things have little beginnings and we must be grateful for even the smallest contribution.

Read More

Testimonial

"Maa Ganga Secondary School has been a second home for our children. The school's emphasis on character building and holistic education has been commendable. Our kids have not only excelled academically but have also grown into confident."
Mr.Yadav
"We are happy with the fostering environment at Maa Ganga Secondary School. Our child's academic progress and overall development have been outstanding these days. We couldn't have chosen a better school for our child."
Mr.Sharma
"The school's commitment to fostering a well-rounded education is truly praiseworthy. Our daughter's talents have been encouraged and nurtured through various extracurricular activities and events. We are grateful to the school for providing a safe and enriching learning environment."
Mr.Khan
